Class ListViewListener.Adapter

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.pivot.wtk.ListViewListener.Adapter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ListViewListener
    Enclosing interface:
    ListViewListener
    @Deprecated
public static class ListViewListener.Adapter
extends java.lang.Object
implements ListViewListener
    Deprecated.
    Since 2.1 and Java 8 the interface itself has default implementations.
    List view listener adapter.
